Public Invention

A 3D-printed Stator

Stator Design

With considerable effort, I created a 3D-printable design for the Gluss Pusher Stator. The stator is the part that holds the coils. The pushrod holds the magnets.

I did this in Autodesk Fusion 360, and my design is freely reusable under Creative Commons Share Alike 4.0 license.


Gluss Pusher Stator by Robert L. Read is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.
